b.span: Certificate under section 203 of the Income-tax Act. 1961 for tax deducted at source from income chargeable under the head Salaries.

td.b: Name and Address of the Employer
Name and Designation of the Employee

td.span: Acknowledgement Nos. of all quarterly statement of TDS under section 200 as provided by TIN Faciliatation Center or NSDL Web-site

td.b: DETAILS OF SALARY PAID AND ANY OTHER INCOME AND TAX DEDUCTION

tr.td: (a).Salary as per the provisions contained in Sec. 17(1)
(b).Value of perquisites u/s 17(2)(as per Form No. 12BA, wherever applicable)
(c).Profit in lieu of salary under section 17(3)(as per Form no. 12BA,wherever applicable)
2.Less:Allowance to the extent exempt under section 10
(c).Fixed Standard Deduction in the lieu of Transport,Conveyance & medical Allowances
7.Add any other income reported by the employee

Note: 1. Aggregate amount deductible under section 80C shall not exceed one lakh rupees
2. Aggregate amount deductible under the three section
,i.e.,80C, 80CCC AND 80CCD, shall not exceed one lakh rupees
10. Aggregate of deductible amount under chapter VI-A
15. Education Cess@3% on(tax at Sl No.12 plus surcharge at Sl No. 13)
19. Less(a). Tax deducted at source u/s 192(1)
19.Less(b). Tax paid by the employer on behalf of the employee u/s 192(IA) on perquisites u/s 17(2)

td.b: DETAILS OF TAX DEDUCTED AND DEPOSITED INTO CENTRAL GOVERNMENT ACCOUNT

td.center: (The Employer is to provide transaction-wise details of tax deducted & deposited)

td.p: I Priyadarshi Pany, Son of Nimai Charan Pany Working in the capacity of Managing Director do hereby certified that a sum of (Rupees Only) has been deducted at source and paid to the credit of Central Government. I further certify that the information given above is true and correct based on the books of account, documents and available records.

table.td:
Digitally signed by
PRIYADARSHI PANY
